bibl.title: Four First Century A.D. Demotic Ostraca from Medinet Habu.
bibl.note: The four documents were found during the excavations of the Chicago Oriental Institute in 1929/1930. - 1. O. Cair. Medinet Habu Inv. 4201. Receipt for the payment of the bath-tax. 4/5 A.D. - 2. Inv. 4284. Receipt for the payment of the bath-tax. 6/7 A.D. - 3. Inv. 1752. Receipt for the payment of the poll-tax. 5/6 A.D. - 4. Inv. 1815. Receipt for the payment of the poll-tax. 8/9 A.D.

bibl.title: Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie Copte

bibl.seg: Sara Nabil Hafiz Ahmed, Four First Century A.D. Demotic Ostraca from Medinet Habu.

The four documents were found during the excavations of the Chicago Oriental Institute in 1929/1930. - 1. O. Cair. Medinet Habu Inv. 4201. Receipt for the payment of the bath-tax. 4/5 A.D. - 2. Inv. 4284. Receipt for the payment of the bath-tax. 6/7 A.D. - 3. Inv. 1752. Receipt for the payment of the poll-tax. 5/6 A.D. - 4. Inv. 1815. Receipt for the payment of the poll-tax. 8/9 A.D.
